messages.title: Mike Barker will deliver change that works for you
Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content:
The Liberal Democrats: 
- Run many of Britain’s biggest cities, including Newcastle, Liverpool and Sheffield. 
-Are stronger now than at any time since 1929. 
-Have Vince Cable, the best man to be Chancellor. 
-Can deliver real change across Britain today. 
Join the campaign for change that works for you.

messages.title: Labour’s shameful record...
messages.content:
Took us into the illegal war in Iraq. 
Raised taxes on the low paid. 
Failed to close the gap between rich and poor. 
In Darlington: The Labour MP had 5 other jobs and didn't even live here. 
Labour wasted our money on mismanaged road and town centre projects.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting to keep the Acute Stroke Unit in Darlington. 'Health services should be available right where people live'.
Vince Cable's plan will mean that's the first £10,000 you earn is tax-free, which will not tax on the first £10,000 of your income - cutting most tax bills by £700.

mentions.candidate: Mike Barker will deliver change that works for you

issues.health: Fighting to keep the Acute Stroke Unit in Darlington. 'Health services should be available right where people live'.

leaflet.personalStatement: Mike Barker and his family are Darlington through and through. His three children were brought up here and attended local schools. Following his wife’s death 11 years ago, Mike brought up his kids on his own, so he knows the difficulties facing young parents today.

politicalExperience.role: Councillor representing North Road Ward on Darlington Borough Council
politicalExperience.achievements: Mike has a record of hard work and success for local people.

endorsements.endorser: Brian Jefferson, the Chair of GOLD (Growing Older Living in Darlington)
endorsements.endorsement: Supports Mike Barker to be Darlington's new MP. 'Mike’s experience, local knowledge and business sense will be good for Darlington.'
